SQL.LOAD: SELECT notification_type_id, notification_begin_date, notification_end_date, audiance_type_id, notification_name, notification_details, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, outage_begin_date, outage_end_date, contact_info, serial_no, enabled, notification_id FROM elp_notification WHERE notification_id = :notification_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT note.NOTIFICATION_ID, note_dit.translation as NOTIFICATION_TYPE, audi_dit.translation as AUDIANCE_TYPE, note.notification_name as notification_name, note.notification_details as notification_details, note.CONTACT_INFO as CONTACT_INFO, note.NOTIFICATION_BEGIN_DATE, note.NOTIFICATION_END_DATE, note.OUTAGE_BEGIN_DATE, note.OUTAGE_END_DATE, note.SERIAL_NO, note.ENABLED FROM ELP_NOTIFICATION note INNER JOIN elp_list_item note_li ON note_li.list_item_id = note.NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN elp_dict_item_translation note_dit ON note_dit.dict_item_id = note_li.dict_item_id INNER JOIN elp_list_item audi_li ON audi_li.list_item_id = note.AUDIANCE_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN elp_dict_item_translation audi_dit ON audi_dit.dict_item_id = audi_li.dict_item_id WHERE note_dit.language_id = :language_id AND audi_dit.language_id = :language_id --dynamic_where_clause ) WHERE ROWNUM <= :row_num --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.LOAD_LIST_FOR_USER: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT N.NOTIFICATION_ID, GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM (N.NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ID,:language_id) as NOTIFICATION_TYPE, GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM (N.AUDIANCE_TYPE_ID,:language_id) as AUDIANCE_TYPE, N.notification_name as notification_name, N.notification_details as notification_details, N.CONTACT_INFO as CONTACT_INFO, N.NOTIFICATION_BEGIN_DATE, N.NOTIFICATION_END_DATE, N.OUTAGE_BEGIN_DATE, N.OUTAGE_END_DATE, N.SERIAL_NO, N.ENABLED FROM ELP_NOTIFICATION N WHERE N.notification_begin_date <= sysdate and N.notification_end_date >= sysdate and N.ENABLED = 'Y' and N.notification_id not in ( select notification_id from elp_user_notification un where un.notification_id = N.notification_id and un.user_id =:user_id) --dynamic_where_clause ) WHERE ROWNUM <= :row_num Order By NOTIFICATION_BEGIN_DATE asc
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_notification SET notification_type_id = :notification_type_id, notification_begin_date = :notification_begin_date, notification_end_date = :notification_end_date, audiance_type_id = :audiance_type_id, notification_name = :notification_name, notification_details = :notification_details, outage_begin_date = :outage_begin_date, outage_end_date = :outage_end_date, contact_info = :contact_info, serial_no = :serial_no, enabled = :enabled, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE notification_id = :notification_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_notification ( notification_type_id, notification_begin_date, notification_end_date, audiance_type_id, notification_name, notification_details, outage_begin_date, outage_end_date, contact_info, serial_no, enabled, created_by, notification_id ) VALUES ( :notification_type_id, :notification_begin_date, :notification_end_date, :audiance_type_id, :notification_name, :notification_details, :outage_begin_date, :outage_end_date, :contact_info, :serial_no, :enabled, :created_by, :notification_id )
